name: MAZE TRIALS ANTHOLOGY- Vol 1
description:
in the twisting corridors of the Maze Trials, dozens of tiny cat people struggle to survive both the test chambers that contain them, and each other.  contained in this twine are 5 stories detailing different trialgoer experiences, some more pleasant than others, but all horror stories. please be aware, these are rougher than the main comic- but if you're looking for more lore and information about the trials, this anthology is indispensible.

if you haven't read the main comic and are still interested in picking up a neat little collection of spooky stories set in a hellish laboratory- go for it! it'll have less context, but we think they're fun even without.

the twine is 13700+ words total, an illustration for each story, little visual aids to help with character appearances, and a save/load feature in order to be readable in multiple sittings. please unzip the file when you get it to make sure the images work!

interested in more? check out our forums or discord! (18+) please consider leaving a review, comment, or rating if you enjoyed- anything helps our discoverability!

INDIVIDUAL SUMMARIES:

CHAPTER ONE: The Twisted Playplace
By Christi + Zoray Mortis
CW: Implied violence + TCP gore, death

CHAPTER TWO: The Tar Pits
By Xavier + Remus Mortis
CW: Violence, assault, TCP gore, torture

CHAPTER THREE: The Wicked Woods
By Ellerie + Iris Mortis
CW: TCP gore, violence, medical trauma, death, relationship abuse

CHAPTER FOUR: The Memory Dive
By HOUNDE, Nana, + Percy Mortis
CW: Unreality, violence + TCP gore, death, deadnaming

CHAPTER FIVE: The God Duo
By Fran + Herian Mortis
CW: Medical trauma, abuse, TCP gore

CSS + Javascript Code by Vyn, tweaked by Mortis
